___children.description: list of groups that are children of this group, their hosts will be added to this group

___hosts.description: list of hosts that are part of this group

___^\\w$.description: Vars for this hosts in this group

___vars.description: Variables to assign to hosts that are part of this group

____meta.description: Key that avoids calling the script per host

___hostvars.description: Each key is a hostname and the value is a dictionary of the variables for that host

description: Ansible Inventory for the script inventory plugin
title: Ansible Inventory
